titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lord Lieutenant of Ireland. For the undeceiving of deluded and seduced people, which may be satisfactory to all that doe not wilfully shut their eyes against the light. In answer to certaine late declarations and acts framed by the Irish popish prelates and clergy in a conventicle at Clonmae-Noise. Licensed by the secretary of the army.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1650 : Ireton)
Ireton, Henry, 1611-1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Corke, and now re-printed at London by E. Griffin and are to be sold in the Old-Baily,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Huntington Library.
